items.title: Learn to Earn: ET Prime Special Series - Part 2 - How auditors try to tell you about hidden liabilities & corporate governance issues
items.description: Think of a financial statement as a mirror. The job of that mirror is to show everything as it is, with all the wrinkles, blemishes, and scars. But what if someone quietly and cleverly covers these up? The reflection suddenly looks better than reality. That is what happens when expenses and liabilities go unrecorded or unrecognised. Every rupee of expense left out makes profit look bigger, and every liability skipped makes equity appear stronger. When auditors notice this, they cannot stay silent. They modify their opinion, effectively telling you: “This picture might be looking prettier than reality.”

items.title: 6 largecap stocks with 25-40% upside potential. Do you own any?
items.description: Analyst forecasts offer more than just numbers as they provide a strategic view of future market potential. For investors seeking the next big opportunity, a closer examination of BSE largecap stocks highlights some promising contenders.According to consensus estimates sourced from Trendlyne, several largecap stocks are expected to generate strong returns over the next 12 months. This projected "upside" reflects the average expected return over the next 12 months, offering a data-backed reference point for investors seeking high-potential largecap opportunities. In this analysis, we highlight six notable largecap stocks with estimated gains ranging from 25% to 40% in the year ahead.

items.title: IPO Calendar: 1 new issue opening; all eyes on LG Electronics, Tata Capital IPO listings this week
items.description: The Indian primary market is set for a relatively subdued week, with only one mainboard IPO — Midwest, opening for subscription. Meanwhile, three ongoing mainboard issues and three SME offerings will close their bidding this week. Investors will also keep an eye on two major listings, Tata Capital and LG Electronics — debuting on Monday and Tuesday, respectively. In total, around eight companies are lined up to list on the exchanges during the week.

items.title: Diwali 2025 Picks: Prabhudas Lilladher’s top 8 technical stocks this festive season. Do you own any?
items.description: This Diwali, Prabhudas Lilladher has spotlighted a curated set of technical stock picks across key sectors, including auto, internet, and consumer-focused businesses.
